DOC.brief_summary: The study evaluate whether prophylactic oxytocin administer third stage labor via IV infusion result low mean blood loss compare IM injection .
DOC.brief_title: IV v IM Oxytocin Third Stage Labor Prevention Postpartum Hemorrhage
DOC.detailed_description: The study compare effect IV infusion IM oxytocin administration proportion woman experience blood loss great equal 350 ml , proportion woman experience blood loss great equal 500 ml , side effect , adverse event change hemoglobin pre- post-delivery . It also assess whether bleed history questionnaire identify woman risk excessive bleeding help define distribution bleed score among woman without excessive bleeding .
DOC.criteria: All woman present active labor live birth study hospital consider participation study Women : Planned transferred delivery via Cesarean section Not deliver live birth Unable provide inform consent due mental impairment , distress labor reason Unwilling and/or unable respond questionnaire background characteristic and/or bleed history .
